## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> summary information to aid decisions and implementation of importing.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00723">723</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Typedefs

### AllocsTy {#a71bf6487af059a880f7d59d84b5f32c4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::FunctionSummary::AllocsTy =  std::vector&lt;AllocInfo&gt;</>}>
Optional list of allocation memprof metadata summaries.

The correspondence between the alloc memprof summary and the allocation callsites in the function is implied by the order in the vector (and can be validated by comparing the stack ids in the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/allocinfo">AllocInfo</a> to those in the instruction memprof metadata). As a memory savings optimization, we only create these for the prevailing copy of a symbol when creating the combined index during LTO.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00930">930</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CallsitesTy {#a1f62a141c9258deb1a9c56a36d269520}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::FunctionSummary::CallsitesTy =  std::vector&lt;CallsiteInfo&gt;</>}>
Optional list of memprof callsite metadata summaries.

The correspondence between the callsite summary and the callsites in the function is implied by the order in the vector (and can be validated by comparing the stack ids in the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/callsiteinfo">CallsiteInfo</a> to those in the instruction callsite metadata). As a memory savings optimization, we only create these for the prevailing copy of a symbol when creating the combined index during LTO.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00920">920</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ParamAccessesTy {#a33440b2285355fd3062506210180f321}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::FunctionSummary::ParamAccessesTy =  std::vector&lt;ParamAccess&gt;</>}>
Uses for every parameter to this function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00911">911</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### addCall() {#a37c294f5981df28f61ab4799fb6e8935}

We use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ValueInfo, 0&gt;</a> instead of std::vector&lt;ValueInfo&gt; for its smaller memory footprint.
